properties.Description: An alert created in alert management service.

severity.Description: Severity of alert Sev1 being highest and Sev3 being lowest.

signalType.Description: Log based alert or metric based alert

monitorCondition.Description: Condition of the rule at the monitor service

targetResource.Description: Target ARM resource, on which alert got created.

targetResourceName.Description: Target ARM resource name, on which alert got created.

targetResourceGroup.Description: Resource group of target ARM resource.

targetResourceType.Description: Resource type of target ARM resource

monitorService.Description: Monitor service which is the source of the alert object.

alertRule.Description: Rule(monitor) which fired alert instance. Depending on the monitor service,  this would be ARM id or name of the rule.

sourceCreatedId.Description: Unique Id created by monitor service

smartGroupId.Description: Unique Id of the smart group

smartGroupingReason.Description: Reason for addition to a smart group

lastModifiedUserName.Description: User who last modified the alert.

payload.Description: More details which are contextual to the monitor service.

isSuppressed.Description: Value indicating whether alert is suppressed.

alertsCount.Description: Total number of alerts in smart group

severity.Description: Severity of smart group is the highest(Sev0 >... > Sev4) severity of all the alerts in the group.

startDateTime.Description: Creation time of smart group. Date-Time in ISO-8601 format.

lastModifiedDateTime.Description: Last updated time of smart group. Date-Time in ISO-8601 format.

resources.Description: Summary of target resources in the smart group

resourceTypes.Description: Summary of target resource types in the smart group

resourceGroups.Description: Summary of target resource groups in the smart group

monitorServices.Description: Summary of monitorServices in the smart group

monitorConditions.Description: Summary of monitorConditions in the smart group

alertStates.Description: Summary of alertStates in the smart group

alertSeverities.Description: Summary of alertSeverities in the smart group

nextLink.Description: The URI to fetch the next page of alerts. Call ListNext() with this URI to fetch the next page alerts.

count.Description: Total number of items of type.
